message.body: Have fun at fionas screening. I have to teach so can't make it. I'll check yr emails tnite
Have a good class! I'll be in class all day tmw but will respond to yr inquiries late!
Perfect. I'm jealous I'm missing the screening. I did the color but stil haven't seen it with sound. Memorize all the voices for me!
I'll bootleg it on my iPhone!
Upload to YouTube at lowest quality!
Perfect. Make sure u get lots of heads in the foreground
Handheld for a doc in doc effect
